entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
